attributes.additional_details: He has done this through his own motivation and at nearly 100 years old, that surely should be rewarded and recognised in some way by the Nation.
attributes.background: If anybody deserves a Knighthood in the 2020 Honours List, it surely is Captain Tom Moore who has raised £12 million for the NHS, through is own selfless efforts.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
